title: Software Developer
descriptions: Development on a full stack project utilizing Vue.js, Typescript, SCSS, and C++. Performing code reviews on others work. Refactoring code to reduce duplication, increase code quality and ensure easier maintainability.
Defined and implemented unit tests to ensure functionality was as expected.
Performed dependency management to ensure external packages were up to date.
Refactored code to remove duplication and improve readability and maintainability.
Developed graphs to provide visualized data to the user using p5.js.
Supervised a co-op student to ensure they understood the project and were progressing as expected.

title: Software Developer Co-op
descriptions: Term 1: Developed a C++ plugin to provide critical information on the current state of the hardware. Participated in bi-weekly sprint meetings and daily standups.
Term 2: Developed feature for an internal Django project used for code and config generation. Performed code reviews on others members work.

Term 3: Refactored Vue.js and Typescript code to improve reusability and maintainability by allowing reuse of a large amount of the same code in over 5 places. Refactored Sass styling throughout all components of a project to ensure Sass guidelines are being followed.
